name: darkfore.st
description:
Darkfore.st is an experimental MMO space colonisation strategy game.

You take control of a newly space-faring civilisation looking to expand beyond their solar system, although with a slight limitation: the light speed barrier. All messages, all ships, all commands, yes everything unfortunately has to abide gods cruel punishment upon us all that we call the laws of physics.

This makes not only space colonisation, but also assessing the strength of other civilisations extremely difficult. An unbreakable speed barrier transforms the universe into a terrifyingly dark and inscrutable forest, with no telling whether the next predator is already on it's way to you or how strong that predator is going to be.

Also playable on https://www.darkfore.st
